text: Yeh log khuda ki kasam kha kha kar kehte hain ke humne woh baat nahin kahi, halanke inhon ne zaroor woh kaafirana baat kahi hai. Woh Islam laney ke baad kufr ke murtakib huey aur inhon ne woh kuch karne ka irada kiya jisey kar na sakey. Yeh inka saara gussa isi baat par hai na ke Allah aur uske Rasool ne apne fazal se inko gani(enrich) kardiya hai! ab agar yeh apni is rawish se baaz aa jayein to inhi ke liye behtar hai, aur agar yeh baaz na aaye to Allah inko nihayat dardnaak saza dega, duniya mein bhi aur aakhirat mein bhi, aur zameen mein koi nahin jo inka himayati aur madadgaar ho
